#include<stdio.h>
int sum(int n);int arr[100];void reset();int s[100];
int main()
{ int t,n,p;scanf("%d",&t);
for(int i=0;i<t;++i)
{reset();scanf("%d",&n);  //sum=0;
for(int j=0;j<n;++j)
{scanf("%d",&arr[j]);
}
for(int  k=0;k<n-1;++k)
{if(arr[k]<arr[k+1])
{s[k+1]+=s[k];      }
else if(arr[k]>arr[k+1])
{p=k;while((s[p+1]>=s[p])&&(arr[p]>arr[p+1]))
{s[p]++;p--;
}
}
//else if(arr[k]==arr[k+1])s[k+1]=1;}
 
}
printf("%d\n",sum(n)); //  reset();
}
 
 return 0;
}
int sum(int n)
{int sum=0;for(int i=0;i<n;++i)
{ {//printf("*%d ",s[i]);
sum+=s[i];}
 
}
return sum;
 
}
 
void reset()
{   for(int i=0;i<100;++i)
s[i]=1;
 
}
